meanings.definition: A type of fish found in rocky areas.
meanings.sent1: The rockfishes swam gracefully among the rocks.
meanings.sent2: We caught some colorful rockfishes while fishing near the shore.
meanings.sent3: The rockfishes decided to start a band and call themselves 'The Rocky Swimmers'.
meanings.sent4: The rockfishes in the aquarium seemed to dance to the music playing nearby.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the rockfishes sparkled under the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: Look at all the rockfishes swimming together in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen caught a large haul of rockfishes to sell at the market.
meanings.sent3: The rockfishes gathered for a family reunion at the bottom of the sea.
meanings.sent4: The rockfishes in the painting seemed to come alive and swim off the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The chef prepared a delicious dish using fresh rockfishes from the local waters.
